attributes.action: Banning of Smoking in all Public Areas
attributes.additional_details:
Smoking is bad. Face it

Should people who have never smoked in there entire lives have to put up with people smoking on the streets of Britain?

I think no. Why should our lives be put at risk because of someone else's decision to smoke?

We shouldn't!

This petition is designed to bring smoking on the streets and other public areas to a final halt!

I am not saying that we should ban smoking.

People are aloud to smoke but only in a private home (inc. Council Housing and Rented Accommodation)

100 000 signatures to get debated in Parliament!

Please sign if you agree with me

Thank you for your time
